snippet: Germany's economy is slowing and will probably stagnate in 2013, the country's central bank said Friday, sharply cutting its growth forecast.
abstract: Germany's central bank says the country's economy is slowing and will most likely  stagnate in 2013, sharply cutting its growth forecast.
lead_paragraph: Germany's economy is slowing and will probably stagnate in 2013, the country's central bank said Friday, sharply cutting its growth forecast.

headline.seo: German Central Bank More Pessimistic About Growth
headline.main: German Central Bank Cuts Economic Growth Forecast
headline.print_headline: German Central Bank Cuts Economic Growth Forecast
